CustomField.description: Difference between lead created date and date of first contact
CustomField.formula: IF(AND((5 - (CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0)) < (CASE(MOD( Date_of_First_Contact__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0)) ), ((( Date_of_First_Contact__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) + 1) < 7)), ((CASE(MOD( Date_of_First_Contact__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0)) - (5 - (CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0)))), (((FLOOR((( Date_of_First_Contact__c - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) - (CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 6, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0))) / 7)) * 5) + (CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 5, 2, 5, 3, 4, 4, 3, 5, 2, 6, 1, 0)) + (CASE(MOD( Date_of_First_Contact__c - DATE(1900, 1, 6), 7), 0, 0, 1, 0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 4, 3, 5, 4, 6, 5, 0))))
CustomField.label: Time for first contact
